      • publisherReceive

        scala.PartialFunction<java.lang.Object,scala.runtime.BoxedUnit> publisherReceive()
        This should be used by the implementer actor's receive method. For example: def receive: Receive = publisherReceive orElse ...
        Returns:
        (undocumented)

      • notifySubscribers

        void notifySubscribers(A a)
        Notifies all subscribers with the given value
        Parameters:
        a - (undocumented)

      • requestCurrent

        void requestCurrent()
        A request to the implementing actor to publish the current state value by calling notifySubscribers(). Implementing classes should override this method and call notifySubscribers() if they have state that need to be published.
